text: Neuburg an der Donau, is a town which is the capital of the Neuburg- Schrobenhausen district in Bavaria in Germany. ==Divisions== The municipality has 16 divisions: * Altmannstetten * Bergen, Neuburg * Bittenbrunn * Bruck * Feldkirchen * Gietlhausen * Hardt * Heinrichsheim * Herrenw√∂rth * Hessellohe * Joshofen * Marienheim * Maxweiler * Laisacker * Sehensand * Zell ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *photographs of Neuburg an der Donau Category:Neuburg-Schrobenhausen
title: Neuburg an der Donau
